articles.author: Nathaniel Meyersohn
articles.title: Target warns about consumer spending. It’s another sign of stress on America’s economy - CNN
articles.description: Target said Tuesday that consumer confidence is declining, and it warned about the impact of tariffs. It’s the latest in a series of red flags about the health of US shoppers and the economy.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump to stand before Congress and offer divided nation an accounting of his turbulent first weeks - The Associated Press
